page.title: 10Law in West Enfield.
page.content: There are two Police Areas in our section,based at Enfield and Southgate Stations.There is one area for Oakwood,Southgate and a small part of Grange Park.Also one area for Trent Park,Cockfosters,Grange Park plus the Ridgeway. Two area cars and five Home Beat officers patrol the area,poilice in unit beat cars back them up. In our area there are three operational and two proposed Neighbourhood Watch Schemes.These consist of members of the public backing police up by keeping their eyes open for anything suspicious. Grange Park and Chase Side are the most crime-stricken areas with the most common crime being Autocrime.From January to April (inclusive) there have been 128 incidents of this in our area.
